extendedInfo.description: Cat playing hard to get? Instantly translate your voice into meows and get kitty's attention. With over 175 quality samples from more than 25 cats, Human-to-Cat Translator dares to impress even the most ill-tempered sourpuss. Human-to-Cat Translator actually performs audio analysis on your voice (for reals) and regurgitates carefully bastardized meows according to your input. Human-to-Cat Translator also includes a 16-meow soundboard for instant access to common cat calls. Download meow and start speaking the delightfully irritating language of cats!FEATURESâ 3 feline voices (upgradable to 6)â 8 high quality cat calls (upgradable to 16)â Samples from over 25 kittiesâ Software actually performs analysis on voice inputâ Supports all human languages (except Swahili)CAT CALLSThe soundboard contains 8 high quality cat calls to instantly command attention. Sounds include different kinds of meowing, bird sounds, mouse sounds, purring and one very angry kitty.Please note: Cats (and other pets) will often respond to the sounds produced by this app. If your pet displays signs of distress or aggression, discontinue use immediately. No animals were harmed in the making of this app.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: Ok my cat was hibernating in our garage cuz she hasnt been feeling well. I used this app and she came to me. To the ppl bullshitting this app- it works. Thank you :)
reviews.author: Amaranda Palmer

reviews.title: Fun...and it will get a cats attention!
reviews.comment: Why do some people have to showcase just how ignorant they are by posting idiotic comments?  Anyway, this is a cool app that definitely got my cat\'s attention.  I\'m not convinced of its scientific validity though.
reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

reviews.title: Good but uh.....
reviews.comment: It did catch the attention of my cat at first and she started getting worried but the after a few minutes, she just went totally aloof
reviews.author: Tiani Chan

reviews.title: Easy fun with your cat
reviews.comment: Not like playing with cats is difficult but this is a quirky way to confuse your cat. Brb, buying full version
reviews.author: Chris Hickok

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: The record thing is a scam! I pressed it and said nothing and it translated it as *meow* *meeow*. Also cats comunicate in single meows, now 2 or 3 meows.
reviews.author: Stefan Todoran

reviews.title: Omg awesome
reviews.comment: My cats are more entertaining ..lol must download ...great to have fun with
reviews.author: David Felice

reviews.title: well,it\'s not what I expected...
reviews.comment: I don\'t like it that much. why not,you ask? well,one,when I opened the app and there was this weird cat on the screen and it scared the crap out of me the first time. reason two is that it\'s either bugged,or fake,because I sat in a quiet room and made no noise and it still \"translated\" and meowed. it\'s cute,but it\'s not what I thought it was. but hey,at least my kitty likes it.
reviews.author: Angel CakeCA

reviews.title: What the double freak?
reviews.comment: Three stars because some freaking freaky cat showed up randomly it scared the CRAP out of me and my brother. WE WILL NOT OPEN THIS FREAKY APP UNTILL FIXED! All due respect but really man... really? I swear one night I went to sleep and heard it in my dreams... I thought about the cat face all that day... every turn I made I saw it. Thanks for nothing jerk faces.
reviews.author: Mya Marie

reviews.title: new Samsung Galaxy S III
reviews.comment: I love it when it translates my words into meows and purrs for my cat Luna. Now we\'re communicating as one. Awesome! Thank you for a great app.
reviews.author: Sarah P.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: my cat was very interested
reviews.author: Brent Curry

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: This is a pretty cool app! Five stars!
reviews.author: Isabel Loves You

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I have kittens and there still alil scared of me , but once I started talking into the app and translating they came running to me !! Really works , and is worth it !
reviews.author: Tyler Mckinney

reviews.title: What the heck!
reviews.comment: A random cat showed up on my screen and scared me!
reviews.author: Mei Lien Miller

reviews.title: AAARRG!
reviews.comment: Oh my god there was a gigantic picture of a scary cat that popped up immediately after I turned it on(wtf!!)It was so scary that I think I just got a fear of cats! Oh my gosh this is the cause of fear of cats syndrome!!!!!! Fix the virus and I will get it again :-(
reviews.author: willow yocky

reviews.title: Why is the cat pic so scary?
reviews.comment: Just because its a cat showing its reeth doesnt make it scary!! I think its cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cat doesn\'t understand a single meow
reviews.comment: My cat when I say something thru the microphone he looks disgusted and struts away. Cool but doesn\'t communicate to my cat. Uninsalled.
reviews.author: Vera Redman

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: This thing translated nothing into a bunch of meows! and now my cat won\'t even go near me! you suck!
reviews.author: sarah sanchez

reviews.title: Does not Work
reviews.comment: When i went on the app it just keeps saying Loading Cats
reviews.author: Thomas sokoloski

reviews.title: Fake
reviews.comment: I sat there and said nothing, but it still translated with meows and mews
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok app
reviews.comment: Nice variety of cat sounds. My cat wasn\'t impressed by it but my dog was. He responded to most of the sounds. Maybe he was a cat in his past life.lol. But its a good app still.
reviews.author: Corinth Williams
